MonsterTrait.Name: Dragon Fanatic
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragonclaw has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonclaw can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonclaw ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

MonsterTrait.Name: Fanatic Advantage
MonsterTrait.Text: Once per turn, if the dragonclaw makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pack Tactics
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragonclaw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonclaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragonclaw attacks twice with its scimitar.

MonsterAction.Name: Scimitar
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
